content: I feel anxious before meetings, even when I am prepared. My heart races and I keep thinking I will mess up. Has anyone found a simple way to calm this?
Some days my mood feels low without any clear reason. I still do my work, but inside I feel heavy and tired. Does anyone else experience this?
I struggle to fall asleep because my mind keeps replaying the day. Even when I am tired, thoughts don’t slow down. What helps you wind down?
I often overthink small comments from others and assume they are upset with me. Later I realize I may have jumped to conclusions. How do you handle this?
Balancing work and personal life feels overwhelming lately. I feel guilty when I rest and stressed when I work. Does anyone relate?
I find it hard to express my needs in relationships. I usually stay quiet to avoid conflict, but then feel resentful later.
Whenever I make a mistake, I keep replaying it in my head for days. Even small errors feel huge. How do you let go?
I feel mentally exhausted even on days when nothing major happens. It’s like my energy drains quickly. Anyone else?
I want to build healthier habits, but I lose motivation after a few days. How do you stay consistent without pressure?
Social situations drain me, even with people I like. I enjoy company but need a lot of recovery time afterward.
I notice my mood improves slightly when I write things down, but I forget to do it regularly. Any tips to make journaling easier?
I feel pressure to always appear okay in front of others, even when I am struggling inside. It feels isolating.
